entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who suggests talking to Mr. Lovegood about the symbol.

entities.name: lovegood
entities.description: Mr. Lovegood is mentioned as someone they should talk to about the symbol.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is linked to the symbol and is a significant figure in the story.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is also linked to the symbol and has a connection to Dumbledore.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as a location connected to the symbol.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who suggests voting on whether to talk to Mr. Lovegood.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is outvoted by Ron and agrees to see Mr. Lovegood.

relationships.description: Hermione suggests talking to Mr. Lovegood about the symbol.
Ron outvotes Harry and decides they should see Mr. Lovegood.
